experience.title: Graduate Student Researcher
experience.description: •Working under Dr Ali Mosleh on Pilot Testing and Evaluation of Safety and Integrity for Targeted Hydrogen Blending in Gas Infrastructure for Decarbonization•Leading the development of an advanced machine learning-based simulation model to evaluate fracture toughness in pipeline steels, focusing on the impacts of hydrogen embrittlement, material composition, and hydrogen concentration.
experience.description_html: •Working under Dr Ali Mosleh on Pilot Testing and Evaluation of Safety and Integrity for Targeted Hydrogen Blending in Gas Infrastructure for Decarbonization•Leading the development of an advanced machine learning-based simulation model to evaluate fracture toughness in pipeline steels, focusing on the impacts of hydrogen embrittlement, material composition, and hydrogen concentration. <!---->
experience.company: The B. John Garrick Institute for the Risk Sciences at UCLA

experience.title: LTD Silicon TD Fabrication Intern
experience.description: •Application Development: Created an automated application to assess lithography wafer quality, that reduced manual intervention by 90%, integrating linear regression, and customizable control limits for critical diameter (CD) variation and approval•Process Optimization: Automated data retrieval and file storage, eliminating local storage needs and cutting analysis time by 95%—from 1-2 hours to under 5 minutes. Integrated and designed Power BI for real-time approvals and visualization•Collaboration & Modeling: Collaborated with lead engineers to implement advanced mathematical models, improving accuracy by 25% through automated approval workflows, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in wafer manufacturing with reduced time
experience.description_html: •Application Development: Created an automated application to assess lithography wafer quality, that reduced manual intervention by 90%, integrating linear regression, and customizable control limits for critical diameter (CD) variation and approval•Process Optimization: Automated data retrieval and file storage, eliminating local storage needs and cutting analysis time by 95%—from 1-2 hours to under 5 minutes. Integrated and designed Power BI for real-time approvals and visualization•Collaboration & Modeling: Collaborated with lead engineers to implement advanced mathematical models, improving accuracy by 25% through automated approval workflows, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in wafer manufacturing with reduced time

experience.title: Engineering Intern
experience.description: Implementing Directional Solidification in Low-Pressure Die Casting (LPDC) molds, Guide: Mr. Harsh K Dhiman, Divisional Manager• The project aimed to identify areas prone to defects in Die Casting focusing on cylinder headdies and developing a strategy to overcome defects using directional solidification. • Explored different material combinations and modeled these strategies using MAGMA 5.4.1 Simulations and analyzed different zones of cooling within the molds.• Obtained 29.4% defect reduction and reduced the rejection rate by two-thirds for the new casts
experience.description_html: Implementing Directional Solidification in Low-Pressure Die Casting (LPDC) molds, Guide: Mr. Harsh K Dhiman, Divisional Manager• The project aimed to identify areas prone to defects in Die Casting focusing on cylinder headdies and developing a strategy to overcome defects using directional solidification. • Explored different material combinations and modeled these strategies using MAGMA 5.4.1 Simulations and analyzed different zones of cooling within the molds.• Obtained 29.4% defect reduction and reduced the rejection rate by two-thirds for the new casts

projects: [{"title":"Regression Model for Fracture Toughness in Pipeline Steels Under Hydrogen Concentration","start_date":"Oct 2023","description":"Guided by Dr. Ali Mosleh, Pilot Testing and Assessment of Hydrogen Blending Integrity in Gas InfrastructureRisk Analysis & Collaborative Partnership: Conducted risk analysis for a large-scale hydrogen blending project in natural gas pipelines, partnering with Sandia Labs and SoCalGas. Played a key role in evaluating decarbonization scenarios and assessing the safety and integrity of gas transmission under various blend conditions.Machine Learning Model Development: Developimg a machine learning model leveraging data from Sandia Labs to assess hydrogen embrittlement's impact on pipeline fracture toughness, blending percentages, and material composition. Co-authored the Safety and Integrity Assessment report, contributing to the 2025 RAMS conference."},{"title":"Defect Prediction & Analysis in Additive Manufacturing using Machine Learning","start_date":"Feb 2022","end_date":"May 2023","description":"Guided by Dr. Murugaiyan Amirthalingam, Assistant Professor, Department of Metallurgy and Materials Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Madras1. Successfully completed the development of a Python-based application that revolutionizes defect analysis in Additive Manufacturing. The user-friendly app allows seamless image uploads, and through advanced Machine Learning algorithms, accurately determines defect type, percentage fatality, and precise locations.2. Led the material-focused segment of the project, conducting thorough examinations on H13 & IN625 samples. These analyses unveiled the correlation between process parameters—such as scanning speed and laser power—and defect manifestation.3. Achieved outstanding results, showcasing the app's potential in enhancing quality control. Currently engaged in the process of finalizing and publishing a research paper to disseminate the project's significant contributions to the field."},{},{"title":"Incorporating Biomimicry for Enhanced Coastal Resilience","start_date":"Jan 2022","end_date":"May 2022","description":"UNSDG 11 – Sustainable Cities & CommunitiesCourse: Introduction to BiomimicryGuided by Dr. Sivakumar M Srinivasan, Professor, Department of Applied Mechanics, Indian Institute of Technology Madras1. Collaborated on a project aligned with United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 11 (UNSDG 11), focusing on sustainable urban development.2. Explored Biomimicry principles to innovate urban infrastructures, specifically addressing flood and disaster resilience in coastal areas.3. Under Dr. Sivakumar M Srinivasan's guidance, devised strategies inspired by nature to mitigate damages caused by natural disasters, enhancing the sustainability of cities and communities."},{"title":"Implemented Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for Precise Image Classification","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Sep 2021","description":"• Spearheaded a project centered on leveraging advanced deep learning techniques to classify input images into distinct categories with optimal accuracy.• Orchestrated the construction of a robust model integrating Convolution, Pooling, and Flattening methodologies, culminating in an impressive final accuracy milestone of 80.65%."}]
